project.name: TEST_COMMON_CREATE_LOG4J
project.description: This is an example will generate a datasource containing the log4j.xml configuration that will be used in ant and springbatch test case.

dataDescription.name: INPUT
dataDescription.dataSet:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <log4j:configuration xmlns:log4j="http://jakarta.apache.org/log4j/" debug="false">
<appender name="consoleAppender" class="org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender"> <param name="Threshold" value="INFO" /> <layout class="org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout"> <param name="ConversionPattern" value="%d{yyyy MM dd HH:mm:ss} %-6p [%t] %m%n" /> </layout> </appender>
<root> <priority value="info" /> <appender-ref ref="consoleAppender" /> </root> </log4j:configuration>
